abstract: Demands for a cigarette, a jacket and a chat with the mayor.
snippet: Demands for a cigarette, a jacket and a chat with the mayor.
lead_paragraph: A Canadian man climbed up a red sculpture in Zuccotti Park early on Saturday and perched there for several hours before the police brought him down, the authorities said.

headline.main: Man Climbs 'Joie de Vivre' Sculpture in Zuccotti Park
